motions.title: Motion to Remove Item #3 from Agenda and Approve Consent Agenda Items #2 and #4
motions.description: Motion to remove item #3 (Construction Agreement with Georgia Department of Transportation) from the agenda and approve consent agenda items #2 and #4.

motions.title: Adoption of the Road Safety Action Plan
motions.description: Adoption of the Road Safety Action Plan as presented by TOOLE Design.

motions.title: Contract Amendment to Collaborative Contract for Senior Planner Position
motions.description: Approval of a contract amendment with Collaborative for the senior planner to move between part-time work and full-time work depending on Georgia Tech's schedule until December 2024.

motions.title: Final ARP (American Rescue Plan) Grant Funding
motions.description: Approval of final ARP (American Rescue Plan) grant funding allocation.

motions.title: Contract Amendment with Lowe Engineers
motions.description: Approval of a contract amendment with Lowe Engineers in the amount of $203,550.00 to provide two new full-time positions in the Parks and Recreation Department.
